mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence and Telegraph Order to Capt. C. M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, telegraph, May 14, 1861 order to Capt. C. M. Stigleman - Floyd Rifles, at Christiansburg from Lt. Col. D. A. Langhorne at Lynchburg. Subject: "Your company will come by next train after reaching Christiansburg." 2 original pieces, telegram and envelope.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
